name: Player (In White!)
description:
You can't kill it! The return of the white theme and more!

"Looks better than the original white theme :-)" - @maktouch
"we'll totes hire you if you get rid of it. /s" - @Katie
"pls kill white theme :(" - @JamieS
additional_info:
Latest Update: April 1st, 2015
Latest Change: Styled "Manage Tags" modal in profiles.

Current Features:

 - Original white theme
 - Notifications / Messaging dropdowns
 - Popovers and User-profile popups
 - Modals (Images, YouTube, Followers, etc.)
 - Profiles
 - Browse
 - Chat Windows
 - Colorized Staff

Planned Features:

 - Whatever else @maktouch decides to throw at me! (✧ω✧)

Follow @TehSeph on player.me for updates and send me a message if you find any bugs!
